sourcesContent:
import * as C from "./chance"
import * as I from "./image"
export type CustomerComment = {
  uuid: string
  name: string
  jobTitle: string
  company: string
  avator: string
  comment: string
}

export const makeCustomerComment = (
  uuid: string,
  name: string,
  jobTitle: string,
  company: string,
  avator: string,
  comment: string
): CustomerComment => ({uuid, name, jobTitle, company, comment, avator})
